Table: Official overview. _kpop_ = population in 1000; _cap?_ = whether the city is the political capital of its region; _reg?_ = whether the number of registered protesters (as per the organizers) is available; _obs?_ = whether the number of observed protesters (as per the police) is available; _incl?_ = whether the data is used in this thesis.
